title: Strengthening Instructional Design Competencies in Practice: Micro-Credential-Based Digital Competency Enhancement for Pre-Service Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental digital tool proficiency and foundational knowledge in instructional design
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more concepts and educational applications of micro-credentials.
Learners can develop language education projects by applying constructivist online learning environment design principles.
Learners can apply portfolio creation and evaluation methods using micro-credentials in an LMS-based self-directed learning environment.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
